ViewObject.Name: XxcsoAccountSearchLovVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT xcav.account_number ,xcav.party_name ,NVL(xcav.customer_class_name, 'ŒÚ‹q') AS customer_class_name FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev ,xxcso_resource_custs_V2 xrcv ,xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xrcv.employee_number = xev.employee_number AND xcav.account_number = xrcv.account_number AND xcav.customer_status IN ('20','25','30','40','50') AND NVL(xcav.customer_class_code, '10') = '10' UNION ALL SELECT xcav.account_number ,xcav.party_name ,NVL(xcav.customer_class_name, 'ŒÚ‹q') AS customer_class_name FROM xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav WHERE xcav.customer_status IN ('90','99') AND xcav.customer_class_code = '16' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM xxcso_resource_custs_V2 xrcv WHERE xcav.account_number = xrcv.account_number ) UNION SELECT xcav2.account_number ,xcav2.party_name ,NVL(xcav2.customer_class_name, 'ŒÚ‹q') AS customer_class_name FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 ,xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xcav2.sale_base_code = xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev2.work_base_code_new, xev2.work_base_code_old, xev2.issue_date, TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) AND xcav2.customer_status IN ('20','25','30','40','50') AND NVL(xcav2.customer_class_code, '10') = '10'
